**Government Tender Announcement**
=====================================

**Title/French Title**
--------------------

*   ***RFP - Multi-Purpose Heavy-Duty Shredder and Conveyor Belt System*** / ***DP - Système polyvalent de déchiquetage pour charges lourdes muni d'une courroie transporteuse***
*   ***WS4021732727-Doc4033513891***

**Key Tender Details**
---------------------

*   ***Amendment Number***: 7
*   ***Publication Date***: 2023-06-02
*   ***Tender Closing Date***: 2023-09-06T14:00:00 (Expired)
*   ***Expected Start and End Date***: Not specified / 2024-10-31

**Goods and Services**
---------------------

*   The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) requires a multi-purpose heavy-duty shredder and conveyor belt system for destroying:
    +   Firearms, such as handguns and rifles
    +   Electronic devices
    +   Uniforms and body armor
*   The system must be delivered to the Greater Vancouver area, with an option to purchase up to three additional systems within 12 months of the contract award date.

**Contracting Entity and End User Information**
------------------------------------------

*   ***Contracting Entity Name***: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) / Ministère des Travaux publics et des Services gouvernementaux (SPAC)
*   ***Contracting Entity Address***: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada
*   ***End User Entities***: Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) / Department of Public Safety and Emergency Preparedness (PS) / Gendarmerie royale du Canada (GRC) / Ministère de la Sécurité publique et de la Protection civile (SP)
